name: Escape from Earx
description:
The Universal Star attacked you, so you have to find a way to escape from your home Earx, and the only way is to buy a rocket to travel to another planet, you don't have any coins, so you will have to collect them, and you will have to upgrade your skills to earn coins faster.

you can either play solo or 2 players.

Languages:

this game support 3 languages :

  • English
  • Arabic
  • French
Controls: Player 1 movementArrow KeysPlayer 2 movementW , A , S , DPause , ResumePRestartR
